mapper.select: SELECT * FROM order_manage WHERE sku = ( SELECT sku FROM order_manage WHERE id = #{orderId} ) AND id != #{orderId} AND order_time < ( SELECT order_time FROM order_manage WHERE id = #{orderId} ) ORDER BY order_time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT id, order_no, size_name, quantity FROM order_quantity WHERE order_no = #{orderNo}

SELECT sp.id sp_id, sp.order_no order_no, sp.process_name process_name, sp.supplier_name supplier_name, sp.unit_price unit_price, sp.simple_use simple_use FROM secondary_process sp WHERE sp.order_no = #{orderNo}

select om.order_no as orderNo,om.sku,om.order_img_url as imgUrl, case when (t.actual_cut_quantity != null) then t.actual_cut_quantity else om.order_quantity end as tailorQuantity, date_format(om.order_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as orderDate,om.remarks as remark from order_manage om left join tailor t on t.order_no = om.order_no where om.order_time >= #{startDate} and om.order_time <= #{endDate} order by om.order_time limit #{offset},#{limit}
